## Type of Change

- [ ] Adding a new tool
- [ ] Updating an existing entry
- [ ] Fixing a broken link
- [ ] Adding a new category
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Checklist

### For New Tools

- [ ] The tool is related to cloud security
- [ ] The tool has been updated within the last 12 months (or is stable/feature-complete)
- [ ] The tool has documentation or a README
- [ ] I have verified the link works
- [ ] The description is concise (one sentence)
- [ ] The entry is placed in alphabetical order within its section
- [ ] I have checked for duplicates

### For All PRs

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the existing format
- [ ] I have checked my spelling and grammar
